options.name: ccnetSettings
options.desc: Configuration for ccnet, see  https://manual.seafile.com/config/ccnet-conf/ for supported values.
options.type: attribute set of section of an INI file (attrs of INI atom (null, bool, int, float or string))

options.name: initialAdminPassword
options.desc: Seafile Seahub Admin Account initial password. Should be change viaSeahub web front-end.

options.name: seafileSettings
options.desc: Configuration for seafile-server, see  https://manual.seafile.com/config/seafile-conf/ for supported values.
options.type: attribute set of section of an INI file (attrs of INI atom (null, bool, int, float or string))

options.name: seafileSettings.fileserver.host
options.desc: The binding address used by seafile fileserver.

options.name: seafileSettings.fileserver.port
options.desc: The tcp port used by seafile fileserver.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: seahubExtraConf
options.desc: Extra config to append to  seahub_settings.py  file. Referto  https://manual.seafile.com/config/seahub_settings_py/ for all available options.

options.name: workers
options.desc: The number of gunicorn worker processes for handling requests.
